com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.comb

Class SproutsStateAfterSubmove

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.comb.SproutsStateAfterSubmove
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SproutsGameState

    public final class SproutsStateAfterSubmove
extends Object
implements SproutsGameState
    Sprouts state after a Submove.

    A submove may tear the cobweb. When that happens, the cobweb edge has to be split at the intersection and a cobweb vertex added to the game state.

    If afterwards there's a cobweb edge that resides in two faces, remove it.
